website_summaries.verdict: With 11 wash cycles to handle any and all types of fabrics, this model is exemplary for the family who does it all.
pros: The model sports a dual-action agitator to thoroughly clean garments, and the dryer is large for a load of fluffy towels or a down comforter
cons: Despite having multiple wash options, the washer doesn't have any additional features
There's no control-lock lid or add-garment pause button

customer_reviews.title: The best reviews of the name name brands.
customer_reviews.text: I choose this because my set up requires a stackable. I love it! The sound it makes is a bit different, but I love being able to add clothes while the water is filling AND have the lid up for 15 minutes!! It has a higher water level than my Kenmore which was a terrible waste of money. 8 years old and repaired many times.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Had this 3 months and it has been great. If something does go wrong I will update review. As of today, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Forsell

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: Both drums are huge and allow you to do full sized loads. I’ve been able to wash my long sized quilts and bedding without any issues. One time a shirt got caught in the washer drum and took some elbow grease and patience to work loose. And a drawstring from my sweatpants got caught in the dryer but other than that I have been completely satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good machine ( recommended) ,  but bad dealers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this machine around a month ago. It worked well but it was making some noises, so I contacted this Sellers Dynamic deals. Those guys didn't helped me at all, all the opposite they tried to scare me with the process and price of sending the machine back. Then I contacted GE directly, and I found out that, like Amazon, they have a excellent Customer Service, so we were able to solve the problem. I recommend the machine, is a good one. But don't buy it from this dealers, there are other ones where you can buy. My 5 stars are for the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam N

customer_reviews.title: Useful, Efficient, Useful, Wonderful, Simple is Great
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit to replace a Frigidaire of similar description. Used in master bedroom on 3rd floor to keep laundry easy and more manageable. Big enough to do a single bedspread (if it's not too thick). Efficient, compact in adjoining closet, easy to operate, with enough choices to leave the operator in control, not the machine!
customer_reviews.author: FRANKLY FILATOV

customer_reviews.title: On appliances large appliances I think buying local is easier
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the stackable washer and dryer I am definitely not impressed with shipping it arrived finally this past Sunday at almost 11 o’clock at night. Delivery have been postponed twice , One Time by me due to the weather we had a tornado warning so I told the driver to reschedule so that was not his fault but otherwise I think maybe if I buy appliances I will buy them local
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough GOOD about this unit!! Both washer and dryer drum capacities are extremely large. Operation buttons are easy to understand. Installation was a breeze. Dryer is extremely quiet when in operation. The only negative I would comment is that when the washer is agitating it has a weird sound... kinda like a duck. It is not annoying but just have not heard a washing machine make this sound before. We are getting a chuckle out of it. Overall we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jdiggs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust their delivery - they don’t care and neither does AM Trucking
customer_reviews.text: This unit may or may not be good - I can’t tell because AM Trucking, who has the contract for home delivery - has no idea where my unit is, when it will be delivered and has either blatantly lied or stuck me on voicemail in trying to find out. I will NEVER order another unit like this if I can’t get it same day. We’ve been without a washer and dryer for two weeks now - if you’re shopping, don’t make our mistake and order it here.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Music Forge

customer_reviews.title: They don't do clean business
customer_reviews.text: I buying new washer and dryer from them but they are send me the used products. before we installed it was a water inside the dryer pipe and second problem dryer it's not working at all and when I told them the issue after asking so much question for taking back there used products they are asking for taking 20% of the money you're paying them and they said you're responsible for returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Agahi

customer_reviews.title: NO PLUG INCLUDED. SURPRISE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Here is the sellers response to me: "hi, we do apologize for the inconvenience, the plug is not supplied by the manufacturer. please search on amazon for the correct dryer plug( different houses have different plugs). Thank you "
customer_reviews.author: TheLewisFamily

customer_reviews.title: It took 3 weeks to get it to function
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very nice, but it would not run when installed! The local rep. came out and said he needed parts. Then after 2 more weeks finally replaced one switch on the front panel and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: David Sloan

customer_reviews.title: It works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with fear lol I mean, who buys a major appliance online? It arrived a week before they promised it would and I have been THRILLED! The Large capacity of both the washer bin and dryer make washing heavy winter quilts a breeze! I <3 the Optimal setting on the dryer ....
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Townsend

customer_reviews.title: Super W/D!
customer_reviews.text: You will love this washer and dryer especially if you are tight on space. The dryer connection in the back rotates which is a nice feature, and it hold large loads. Follow the directions carefully.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Better than I deserve
customer_reviews.text: More than adequate for its purpose. I put it in my master bedroom closet so would not have to walk around the house to the laundry room everytime i needed a towel. Now they are warm and in my bathroom! Nice. #lazyasfck
customer_reviews.author: robert j kellett, md

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: IT is a great unit. It’s easy to use and does a perfect job!
customer_reviews.author: Alwayslearning

customer_reviews.title: Order an electrically cord.
customer_reviews.text: The washer and dryer are wired together. You can’t have one without the other.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth wright

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Make a little more noise when washing clothes only time will tell on durability
customer_reviews.author: james w. lunsford

customer_reviews.title: very timely and secure delivery
customer_reviews.text: This unit was everything as advertised works great delivery people were friendly and helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this unit. so quiet with hook ups fits in my closet. 220v line is needed. w/four wires.
customer_reviews.text: Great for my condo. quiet, quick and very big inside drums.
customer_reviews.author: AL POLLACK

customer_reviews.title: Got my monies worth for sure!
customer_reviews.text: The unit araived today! I am very happy with my purchase. The product looks great, runs smooth and quiet. The delivery personel were courtious and cleaned up the packaging! 100% Satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paddy Quint

customer_reviews.title: It is fine
customer_reviews.text: It is working fine, although it is a little bit noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Prado

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy-Extremely noisy
customer_reviews.text: I just spent close to $400 to install and vent the machine today. This machine replaced a Whirlpool that lasted and never had a problem until the last few months. This machine is extremely noisy even with the door to the closet is shut. Further, the floor in the room vibrates. In addition, the door to the dryer does not stay open so if you are short, like my wife, the door will close in your face. I will be calling GE in the morning. Spend a little more money and get a better machine.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Horribly designed and made cheaply
customer_reviews.text: Unit is cheaply made and horribly designed. Clothes can fall from the washer down into the bottom of the unit. Said clothes can get caught in the belt which can easily slide off the drive pulley because the manufacturer wanted to save 5 cents and not have a channel for a grooved drive belt. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Noisey, unreliable, breaks down.
customer_reviews.text: This combination fit the size of the available opening in our home. The combination is very noisy, and seems to love the repairman. Very annoying to have break downs when laundry awaits. I will not purchase GE laundry combinations again. This product is so unreliable. Unlike the long lasting early GE washer and dryers.
customer_reviews.author: peter tacy

customer_reviews.title: Crappy policy
customer_reviews.text: Sad This gets a 1 star review just because their door handles are crap, it actually works well as a washer dryer. But they charge 50 bucks for a replacement door handle. It will break, I assure you. its not a matter of IF, its a matter of WHEN. Sadly they do not stand by their product.
customer_reviews.author: John Hat

product_meta.title: GE GUD27ESSMWW Unitized Spacemaker 3.8 Washer with Stainless Steel Basket and 5.9 Cu. Ft. Capacity Electric Dryer, White
product_meta.description: Rotary-electronic controls (washer) Simplify cycle selection and 11 wash cycles are designed to specifically handle various fabrics and soils. Rotary electromechanical controls (dryer)-Allows fast, easy cycle selection. All-in-one design combines a washer and dryer into a compact Package to take up minimal floor space.
feature_bullets: 11 wash cycles are designed to specifically handle various fabrics and soils
Cycle status lights help easily see where your load is in the cleaning process
Sensing washer will automatically measure the load size and add just the right amount of water

specifications.Included Components: Unitized Spacemaker 3.8 Cu. Ft. Capacity Washer with Stainless Steel Basket and 5.9 Cu. Ft. Capacity Electric Dryer
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
